name: wallop
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to hit someone hard, especially with the flat part of the hand or with something held in the hand: She walloped him across the back of the head.
to defeat someone easily, especially in sports: "How did your tennis game go last night?" "Oh, I was walloped again."
